channel.title: About on Sara A. Stoudt
channel.description: Recent content in About on Sara A. Stoudt

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Sara Stoudt. I am a fourth year student in the UC Berkeley Statistics Department and a Berkeley Institute for Data Science Fellow. Prior to being a BIDS Fellow, I was supported by a National Physical Sciences Consortium Fellowship with the National Institute of Standards and Technology and part of the Data Science for the 21st Century: Environment and Society Training Program . My research focus is on ecological applications of statistics, and I am advised by Will Fithian and Perry de Valpine.
